srg.title: Saribu Rumah Gadang Village
srg.description: The Saribu Rumah Gadang area is a Minangkabau traditional village located in Nagari Koto Baru. Here, you will find hundreds of 'rumah gadang' traditional houses, still standing strong and inhabited. Its unique, magnificent architecture and serene rural atmosphere make it a must-visit destination to experience authentic Minang culture.
srg.location: Koto Baru Village, Sungai Pagu District

liki.title: Liki Tea Plantation
liki.description: This refreshing green expanse of tea plantation lies at the foot of Mount Kerinci. The cool air and spectacular scenery make it a perfect escape from the city's hustle and bustle. You can walk among the tea trees and capture moments with an incredibly beautiful backdrop.

goa.title: Batu Kapal Cave
goa.description: A hidden geological wonder, Batu Kapal Cave offers an adventure into the earth's belly. The name 'Batu Kapal' (Stone Ship) comes from the shape of one of its rock formations resembling a ship. Inside the cave, you will be amazed by stalactites and stalagmites formed over thousands of years. Sunlight piercing through crevices creates a magical scene.

header.title: The Heart of Culture and Nature of West Sumatra

content.title: Welcome to Solok Selatan
content.p1: Located along the majestic Bukit Barisan mountain range, South Solok Regency is a gem that holds extraordinary natural and cultural wealth. Known as the "Heart of Minangkabau", this region offers an authentic travel experience, far from the crowds, where tradition and nature blend harmoniously.
content.p2: From the soothing expanse of tea plantations on the mountain slopes to the warmth of the iconic Saribu Rumah Gadang village, every corner of South Solok tells its own story. We invite you to explore, feel, and fall in love with the true charm of the Minang land.
whyUsPoints: Cultural Authenticity: Experience the real life of the Minangkabau people.
Complete Natural Beauty: From mountain peaks, tea fields, to exotic caves.
Adventure for All: A variety of challenging activities and family recreation.
Local Hospitality: The warm welcome from local people will make your trip memorable.
